ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Comptonized blackbody spectrum after Nishimura et al. (1986). XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: Comptonized blackbody model after Nishimura, Mitsuda and Itoh, 1986, PASJ, 38, 819.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: electron temperature of the hot plasma (keV)
(L_39/D_10)^2, where L_39 is the source luminosity in units of 10^39 ergs/sec and D_10 is the distance to the source in units of 10 kpc

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
